Method Detail

validateCurrentLoadSettingLBR

public static boolean validateCurrentLoadSettingLBR(com.kuka.roboticsAPI.deviceModel.LBR anLBR,
                                                    java.lang.StringBuffer errString)
To validate the LBR data the function request following data from the LBR Observer Variance, rank, axisextTau and cartexttau to avoid a extended position. For successful validation, the robot MUST be in a nonsingular Configuration AND the LoadParameters (and the Gravitation-Parameters) MUST be correct

Parameters:
anLBR - the LBR Instance to be inquired
errString - - a debug text, which is modified inside this function...
Returns:
true if the LBR Parameter set is ok and the LBR is in an allowed start Position

validateCurrentLoadSetting

public static boolean validateCurrentLoadSetting(com.kuka.roboticsAPI.geometricModel.PhysicalObject theLBRwithTool,
                                                 java.lang.StringBuffer errString)
Validates instantaneous load setting from the measurements on the realtime system.

Parameters:
theLBRwithTool - - > the LBR will be located inside the graph
errString - the error message
Returns:
true: Load Valid false: Load invalid
